name: Stargate Bridged USDC (Plume)
description: USDC.e is a bridged version of USD Coin (USDC) deployed on the Plume blockchain via the Stargate protocol. It acts as a wrapped representation of native USDC, maintaining a 1:1 peg to the US dollar. USDC.e enables users to access stable, dollar-denominated liquidity on Plume by bridging USDC from other chains such as Ethereum, facilitating seamless cross-chain value transfer and supporting on-chain transactions and DeFi activities.
